contest-event.event-date:
Oct. 2, 1943 D Wigan Contest
Wigan Contest 0 Own Choice Test Piece Contest Wigan Contest wigan-contest
Test Piece Contest
In Days of Old
Drill Hall, Powell Street, Wigan March contest (Own choice)- 1st R.O.F.S.A., 2nd Leigh B.L., 3rd Dobson & Barlow. Hymn tune (Eventide) - 1st Standish, 2nd R.O.F.S.A. Best cornet - Cheetham Hill. Prizes - 1st £20, 2nd £10, 3rd £5, 4th £3. 1st annual contest promoted by Wigan Borough Band. 11 bands competed.
Dec. 4, 2012, 11:19 a.m. Feb. 1, 2019, 11:58 a.m.
1 Cheetham Hill Band J. Jennings
2 Haigh Prize J. A. Mather
3 Parr (St. Helens) Band Joseph Stevens
4 Pemberton Old Wigan DW Band James Fairhurst
5 Royal Ordnance Factory William Haydock
Unknown Result Dobson & Barlow Ltd John W. Hughes
Unknown Result Leigh Silver Band Harry Foxwell
Unknown Result Blackpool Associated Works Stanley Rowe
Unknown Result Standish Subscription F. Wilson
Unknown Result Bedford (Leigh) Band W. Charlesworth
Unknown Result Atherton Public Prize Band Abram Fairclough
